basic.description:
A special topics practicum offering that combines activity-based sessions in a given area (e.g. dance, martial arts, first aid) with relevant theory. Depending on the activity offered, certification options may be available.
NOTE    Other costs (e.g. First Aid Certification) may apply depending on the activity offering and are the responsibility of the student.
basic.subject: PACT
basic.title: Special Topics - Physical Activity-Based Experience

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Level 3 or 4 in PHED Plan and PACT100.
